name: Félix Gómez Mármol
content: Félix Gómez Mármol - Biography Félix Gómez Mármol University of Murcia Home Publications Research Projects Evaluator Editor & TPC Teaching Contact Short Bio Always eager to learn, improve, become a better person and meet new goals, I am a researcher in the field of cybersecurity aiming at finding innovative solutions to protect ICT systems and their users against cyberthreats and cyberattacks. After receiving my M.Sc. and PhD in Computer Science (in 2007 and 2010, respectively), both from the University of Murcia, I joined NEC Laboratories Europe in Heidelberg as a Research Scientist. In 2012 I was promoted to Senior Researcher in the same institution. From March 2017 to February 2022 I worked as a «Ramón y Cajal» Researcher at the University of Murcia. Currently, I am an Assistant Professor and my research focus is specifically on cybersecurity related topics.
